} const SuggestedNovels = () => { const types = ["Ngn Tnh", "Truyn Teen", "Tin Hip", "Kim Hip", "Xuyn Khng"]; const suggestedNovels = [{carousel: "carousel-item active", novels:[{title: "[Thp Nin 70] Nng Du May Mn", novel: "[Thp Nin 70] Nng Du May Mn", chapter: "Full"}, {title: "[Thp Nin 70] N Thanh Nin Tr Thc Dng Cm", novel: "[Thp Nin 70] N Thanh Nin Tr Thc Dng Cm", chapter: "Full"}, {title: "M Nhn Nn N Nm 80 [Xuyn Th]", novel: "M Nhn Nn N Nm 80 [Xuyn Th]", chapter: "Full"}]}, {carousel: "carousel-item", novels:[{title: "[Thp Nin 80] M Nhn Nh Mt", novel: "[Thp Nin 80] M Nhn Nh Mt", chapter: "Full"}, {title: "Vn C Nht Con R", novel: "Vn C Nht Con R", chapter: "Chng 907"}, {title: "Cu Tinh B Th Quyt", novel: "Cu Tinh B Th Quyt", chapter: "Chng 7330"}]} ]; let Count = 0; for (let i = 0; i < suggestedNovels.length; i++) { let novels = suggestedNovels[i].novels; for (let i2 = 0; i2 < novels.length; i2++) { novels[i2].image = images.suggestedNovels[Count++]; } } return
{types.map(renderTypeNovels)}
{suggestedNovels.map(renderGridSuggestedNovels)}
} const TitleSection = (props) => { return

{props.title}

} const renderTypeNovels = (type) => { return {type} } const renderGridSuggestedNovels = (SuggestedNovels) => { return
{SuggestedNovels.novels.map(renderSuggestedNovels)}
} const renderSuggestedNovels = (data) => { return
{data.novel}

{data.chapter}

} const SelectedTranslationNovels = () => { const translatedNovels = [{title: "Bt u Lm Thn Ho T Sau Khi Thi i Hc", before: "", novel: "Bt u Lm Thn Ho T Sau Khi Thi i Hc", after: "", chapter: "Chng 3565"}, {title: "an Hong V ", before: "", novel: "an Hong V ", after: "", chapter: "Chng 3564"}, {title: "Th Ra Ta L Tuyt Th V Thn", before: "", novel: "Th Ra Ta L Tuyt Th V Thn", after: "", chapter: "Chng 1312"}, {title: "Tr li Thp Nin 70: Mang Theo Thnh Th Lm giu", before: "Tr li Thp Nin 70: ", novel: "Mang Theo Thnh Th Lm giu", after: "", chapter: "Full"}, {title: "Ngi c Sch i Ngy", before: "", novel: "Ngi c Sch i Ngy", after: "", chapter: "Chng 3565"}, {title: "Bt Ph Vinh Quang, Bt Ph Em", before: "", novel: "Bt Ph Vinh Quang, Bt Ph Em", after: "", chapter: "Chng 553"}, {title: "[Thp Nin 60] Gy Dng Li Gia nh", before: "[Thp Nin 60] ", novel: "Gy Dng Li Gia nh", after: "", chapter: "Chng 163"}, {title: "[Thp Nin 70] Kiu Tc Ph", before: "[Thp Nin 70] ", novel: "Kiu Tc Ph", after: "", chapter: "Chng 246"} ]; for (let i = 0; i < translatedNovels.length; i++) { translatedNovels[i].image = images.translatedNovels[i]; } return
